articles.title: Natasa Stankovic puts divorce rumours with hubby Hardik to rest, affirms 'Pandya' status in new viral post - The Economic Times
articles.description: Natasa Stankovic's recent social media activity has dispelled rumors of her divorce from Hardik Pandya. She restored her wedding photos and playfully referenced the 'Pandya' name in a post featuring her pet, signaling a harmonious relationship. Despite earlie…
